languages.text: "Встретимся вновь мы, Домин, когда нити судьбы соткут кровавый узор".
"We will meet again, Domin, when the threads of fate weave a bloody pattern."
languages.original_text: "Встретимся вновь мы, Домин, когда нити судьбы соткут кровавый узор".

traits.locale_text: "We will meet again, Enim, when the threads of fate weave a bloody pattern."
"We will meet again, Enim, when the threads of fate weave a bloody pattern."
"We will meet again, Enim, when the threads of fate weave a bloody pattern."
"We will meet again, Enim, when the threads of fate weave a bloody pattern."
"We will meet again, Domin, when the threads of fate weave a bloody pattern."
"We will meet again, Domin, when the threads of fate weave a bloody pattern."

languages.text: "Wir werden uns wiedersehen, Domin, wenn die Fäden des Schicksals ein blutiges Muster weben."
languages.original_text: "We will meet again, Domin, when the threads of fate weave a bloody pattern."

traits.locale_text: "Wir werden uns wiedersehen, Domin, wenn die Fäden des Schicksals ein blutiges Muster weben."

languages.text: «Volveremos a encontrarnos, Domin, cuando los hilos del destino tracen un patrón sangriento».
languages.original_text: "We will meet again, Domin, when the threads of fate weave a bloody pattern."

traits.locale_text: «Volveremos a encontrarnos, Domin, cuando los hilos del destino tracen un patrón sangriento».

languages.text: 「またお会いしよう、ドミン。運命の糸が血の模様を描いたときに」
languages.original_text: "We will meet again, Domin, when the threads of fate weave a bloody pattern."

traits.locale_text: 「またお会いしよう、エニム。運命の糸が血の模様を描いたときに」

languages.text: “当命运的丝线编织出血腥的图案时，我们会再次见面，秘者。”
languages.original_text: "We will meet again, Domin, when the threads of fate weave a bloody pattern."

traits.locale_text: “当命运的丝线编织出血腥的图案时，我们会再次见面，秘者。”

languages.text: « Nous nous reverrons, Domin, quand les fils du destin tisseront une trame de sang. »
languages.original_text: "We will meet again, Domin, when the threads of fate weave a bloody pattern."

traits.locale_text: « Nous nous reverrons, Domin, quand les fils du destin tisseront une trame de sang. »

languages.text: "Kaderin iplikleri kana bulanmış bir motif ördüğünde yeniden karşılaşacağız Domin."
languages.original_text: "We will meet again, Domin, when the threads of fate weave a bloody pattern."
